fact: Dexamethasone is a corticosteroid used for its anti-inflammatory and immunosuppressive effects.
false: Is dexamethasone a treatment for all COVID-19 patients?

fact: People should NOT wear masks when exercising, as masks may reduce the ability to breathe comfortably.
false: People should wear masks at all times devoid of the circumstances

fact: The COVID-19 virus does not transmit through water while swimming. However, the virus spreads between people when someone has close contact with an infected person.
false: COVID-19 can be transmitted through water bodies

fact: The likelihood of shoes spreading COVID-19 is very low
false: Shoes and other footwear can spread the virus at a faster rate from an infected place

fact: The coronavirus disease (COVID-19) is caused by a virus, NOT by bacteria
false: Corona is a type of bacteria which spreads rapidly

fact: Most people who get COVID-19 recover from it
false: COVID-19 cannot be cured and cannot be recovered
